mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user (user_email, user_password, user_name, user_address, user_phonenumber) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userAddress}, #{userPhonenumber})
INSERT INTO tbl_junior_user (user_id, user_career_years, user_resume) VALUES (LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{userCareerYears}, #{userResume})
mapper.select: select user_email from tbl_junior_user where user_email = #{userEmail}

select u.user_id, u.user_email, u.user_password, u.user_name, u.user_address, u.user_phonenumber, j.user_career_years, j.user_resume from tbl_user u left join tbl_junior_user j on u.user_id = j.user_id where u.user_email = #{userEmail} and u.user_password = #{userPassword};
